text: Billie Bird Sellen (February 28, 1908 – November 27, 2002), known professionally as Billie Bird, was an American actress and comedian. She played Margie in Dear John (1988–1992). ==References== Category:1908 births Category:2002 deaths Category:Deaths from Alzheimer's disease Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from Idaho Category:Comedians from Idaho
title: Billie Bird
